"Closed Beta Test":
"Congratulations on defeating Nogleth!

This concludes the guidance to the gameplay of PSO2:NGS.
Please enjoy the game freely until the end of the test period."

"In Central City are many characters who will provide you
with Side Tasks, when you talk to them.

By completing these tasks, you can experience various
content of PSO2:NGS. so we recommend giving it a try!"
